desc: Designed to meet the needs of users from a broad range of experience levels, Microsoft Windows 7 – Illustrated Complete equips your students with Windows 7 knowledge using a practical, user-friendly format. This streamlined book gets students up and running with Windows 7 and covers all of the newest Windows 7 features, including HomeGroup, Jump Lists, Libraries, and more!
title: Microsoft Windows 7: Illustrated Complete (Available Titles Skills Assessment Manager (SAM) – Office 2010)
